trans-unit.source: Defines the binding element used to create a custom peer resolver.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement"></xref> class by cloning the provided custom peer resolver binding.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement"></xref> instance which contains the settings to clone for the new binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement"></xref> class with the provided resolver settings.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings"></xref> object that contains the specific settings for the new binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement"></xref> class with the provided binding context and resolver settings.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> object that contains the binding context for resolvers created by this binding.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings"></xref> object that contains the specific settings for the new binding.
Gets and sets the endpoint address of the peer on which resolvers created by this binding will run.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> object that contains the network address of the peer on which resolvers created by this binding will run.
Gets and sets the network binding used by resolvers created with this binding element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> that specifies the network binding used by resolvers created with this binding element.
Creates a channel factory that can be used to create a channel for sending messages.
This method can be used to get a channel factory for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> that specifies the binding context for the channel factory.
The type of channel to produce.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory"></xref> that contains the new channel factory of the specified type.
Creates a channel listener of the specified type for receiving messages.
This method can be used to get a channel listener for receiving messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> that specifies the binding context for the channel listener.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel"></xref> that specifies the type of the channels to produce.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> that contains the new channel listener of the specified type.
Determines whether a channel factory of the specified type can be built.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> that specifies the binding context for the channel factory.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel"></xref> that specifies the type of the channels to produce.
True if this binding element can produce a channel factory of the specified type; false if it cannot.
Determines whether a channel listener of the specified type can be built.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> that specifies the binding context for the channel listener.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel"></xref> that specifies the type of the channel listener.
True if this binding element can produce a channel listener of the specified type; false if it cannot.
Creates a copy of the current binding element.
The object returned by this method can be reboxed as an object of the more specific <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement> type.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement"></xref> that contains a copy of the current binding element.
Creates a new instance of the custom peer resolver.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver"></xref> object that contains a new custom peer resolver with the settings supplied to this binding element.
Returns a property from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> object.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref> that specifies the binding context.
The specific property to obtain from the binding context.
The property from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext"></xref>.
Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref> that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
